long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Media.io chrome screen recorder is an all-round video recorder & editor, designed to capture, edit, save or post videos on the fly. 100% free and convenient to use!

With Media.io, you can record your screen, webcam, or both with internal audio and voiceover with minimal effort. It also comes with a multitude of editing tools to level up your captured contents, making information presentation and sharing easier. Perfect for business, education or personal life.

The service is trusted by millions of users, and it would be appreciated if you could provide feedback and suggestions to help us get better.

What can Media.io do for you?

-Recording made easy
Capture an entire desktop screen, window, or tab in 1 click.
Record your face to add a personalized touch.
Support internal & external audio recording.
Output HD results (480P/720P/1080P).
Grab unlimited videos for free.
Watermark-free.

-Powerful in-built editor
Split, cut, crop, flip, rotate, merge your recordings.
Add shapes, texts and markers to add annotations.
AUTO transcribe recordings to texts or subtitles.
Royalty-free stock templates, emojis & music.
Export as MP4, WebM, MP3, or more.

-Save & share your awesome recordings
Access all recordings on the cloud or download locally.
Resize videos with preset sizes for social media.
Copy a shareable link with 1 click (coming soon).


How does it work?
1.	Choose a recording mode.
Launch Media.io recorder and select “screen only”, “webcam only”, “audio only” or “screen + webcam” mode based on your needs.
2.	Customize settings and start recording.
Input camera and audio devices (when needed). Choose the screen area that you want to capture and hit “Start Recording” button. 
3.	Edit/Export your recordings.
Once the recording completed, click on “Stop” and “Add to Timeline” to do any edits you deem necessary. Finally, export and share your clips.
